title: Herbert Hoover National Historic Site: Bookstore
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Bookstore            Bookstore        Educational items are for sale in the visitor center bookstore. NPS Photo by John Tobiason   Â     The park bookstore at the visitor center is operated by Eastern National, a not-for-profit cooperating organization. All purchases benefit Herbert Hoover National Historic Site. Eastern National provides quality educational products and services to the visitors to America's national parks and other public trusts. You may also shop at the on-line bookstore for Herbert Hoover National Historic Site.
